description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings (especially semimembranosus/semitendinosus).
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على hamstrings (especially semimembranosus/semitendinosus).
instructions_en: Start standing with bar at hip level
Slight knee bend (15-20 degrees) - KEEP THIS ANGLE
Hinge at hips, push butt BACK
Lower bar along thighs, keep it close
Drive hips forward to stand, squeeze glutes at top
tips_en: Bending knees too much → Keep slight bend fixed
Rounding lower back → Keep chest up, lats engaged
Bar drifting away from body → Keep it touching your legs
Going too heavy too fast → Master form first

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings.

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings (unilateral).
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على hamstrings (unilateral).
instructions_en: Hold weight in opposite hand of working leg
Hinge forward while back leg lifts behind
Reach weight toward ground, not forward

instructions_en: One foot slightly behind the other (kickstand position)
80% weight on front leg, 20% on back

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings (more stretch than rdl).
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على hamstrings (more stretch than rdl).
instructions_en: Lower bar toward feet (vs mid-foot in RDL)
Keep back flat - if it rounds, don't go lower

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings, erectors.
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على hamstrings, erectors.
instructions_en: Bar on upper back (high bar or low bar position)
Hinge at hips, push butt back
Lower until torso near parallel to floor
Feel hamstring stretch, drive hips forward to stand
tips_en: Going too heavy → Start very light
Excessive knee bend → Maintain soft knee angle

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings (all heads).
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على hamstrings (all heads).
instructions_en: Pad just above heels, hips pressed into bench
Point toes (plantar flexion) to reduce calf assistance
Squeeze hard at top, hold 1 second
tips_en: Hips rising off pad → Stay flat, use less weight
Stopping short of full contraction → Squeeze all the way up
Dropping the weight → Control eccentric for 2-3 seconds

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings (eccentric emphasis).

Catch yourself with hands, push back up

description_en: A legs exercise focusing on the hamstrings, glutes.
description_ar: تمرين legs يركز على hamstrings, glutes.
instructions_en: Start parallel to floor, torso hanging
Use hamstrings to pull torso up
Finish by extending hips at top
tips_en: Using back instead of hamstrings → Focus on knee flexion portion
Pad too low → Position above knee
Rushing the movement → Slow and controlled
